titles: Truth & innocency triumphing over falshood [and] envy, or Jasper Batt's vindication against William Roger's un-christian [sic] and false insinuations, in his book mis-called The Christian Quaker, &c.
author: Batt, Jasper, d. 1702.
publisher: printed for John Bringhurst, printer and stationer, at the sign of the Book in Grace-Church-Street,
notes: A reply to: Rogers, William.  The Christian Quaker.
Reproduction of the original in the Friends' House Library, London.
keywords: Rogers, William, d. ca. 1709. --  Christian Quaker distinguished from the apostate & innovator.
Society of Friends --  Apologetic works --  Early works to 1800.
